p: The total phenolic and flavonoid contents of a M. chamomilla extract were 37.51 and 21.72 mg/g of dry weight, respectively; this report was formerly accomplished by using HPLC-DAD [ 40]. Moreover, chlorogenic acid, apigenin-7-glucoside, rutin, cynaroside, luteolin, apigenin and apigenin-7-glucoside derivatives were previously qualified as the significant phytochemical composition of M. chamomilla extract [ 23].
